title: Alternative medicine professional visit frequency among adults U.S. 2018 | Statista
author: Frédéric Michas; Nov
description: This statistic shows the frequency adults in the U.S.
cleaned_text: Frequency U.S. adults visited or consulted an alternative medicine professional 2018 [This statistic shows the frequency adults in the U.S. visited or consulted an alternative medicine professional as of 2018. According to data provided by](#statisticContainer) [Ipsos](https://www.ipsos.com/sites/default/files/ct/news/documents/2018-07/global_views_on_healthcare_2018_-_graphic_report_0.pdf), seven percent of U.S. adults stated they visited or consulted an alternative medicine professional once a year.
